mapper.insert: insert into t_aop_contract (CONTRACT_ID, TENANT_ID, COMPANY_NAME, OPENING_BANK, REPRESENTATIVE, EMAIL, TELEPHONE, STATE_TAX_NUM, OPENING_NAME, COMPANY_ADDRESS, BANK_CRAD, CONTACTS, CONTRACT_YEAE, SERVICE_COST, PACKAGE_SUM, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, EFFECTIVE_TIME, FAILURE_TIME, CONTRACT_STATUS, FST_CHAR_ATTR_VAL, SECD_CHAR_ATTR_VAL, THRD_CHAR_ATTR_VAL) values (#{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openingBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{representative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stateTaxNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCrad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractYeae,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{packageSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{failureTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{contractStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fstCharAttrVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secdCharAttrVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thrdCharAttrVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_aop_contract set TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENING_BANK = #{openingBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPRESENTATIVE = #{representative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE_TAX_NUM = #{stateTaxNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENING_NAME = #{openingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ADDRESS = #{companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_CRAD = #{bankCrad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACTS = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_YEAE = #{contractYeae,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_COST = #{serviceCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PACKAGE_SUM = #{packageSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EFFECTIVE_TIME = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FAILURE_TIME = #{failureTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONTRACT_STATUS = #{contractStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FST_CHAR_ATTR_VAL = #{fstCharAttrVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECD_CHAR_ATTR_VAL = #{secdCharAttrVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THRD_CHAR_ATTR_VAL = #{thrdCharAttrVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CONTRACT_ID = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select CONTRACT_ID, TENANT_ID, COMPANY_NAME, OPENING_BANK, REPRESENTATIVE, EMAIL, TELEPHONE, STATE_TAX_NUM, OPENING_NAME, COMPANY_ADDRESS, BANK_CRAD, CONTACTS, CONTRACT_YEAE, SERVICE_COST, PACKAGE_SUM, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, EFFECTIVE_TIME, FAILURE_TIME, CONTRACT_STATUS, FST_CHAR_ATTR_VAL, SECD_CHAR_ATTR_VAL, THRD_CHAR_ATTR_VAL from t_aop_contract where CONTRACT_ID = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select CONTRACT_ID, TENANT_ID, COMPANY_NAME, OPENING_BANK, REPRESENTATIVE, EMAIL, TELEPHONE, STATE_TAX_NUM, OPENING_NAME, COMPANY_ADDRESS, BANK_CRAD, CONTACTS, CONTRACT_YEAE, SERVICE_COST, PACKAGE_SUM, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, EFFECTIVE_TIME, FAILURE_TIME, CONTRACT_STATUS, FST_CHAR_ATTR_VAL, SECD_CHAR_ATTR_VAL, THRD_CHAR_ATTR_VAL from t_aop_contract
